full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA MO GLUD RDZONGS 'PHRAL RKYEN PHYIR BZLOG GDON BGEGS TSAR GCOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'DI NI RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR @004B MA MO'I GLUD RDZONGS RGYAS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSDUS, ,BSDUS PA RNAMS LA CUNG ZAD BSNAMS TE, ,CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS BSGRIGS PA LA, ,SPYAN LDAN MKHAS PA RNAMS LA BZOD PAR GSOL, ,YI GE PA NI AU LEM CI PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL LO, ,DGE'O, ,)
